TRIAL & PROJECT USE ONLY

This application is provided for trial, testing, and educational purposes only.

IMPORTANT NOTICE:
• Developers do not host, store, promote, or distribute any content
• All media content is provided by you via public links
• This application simply downloads publicly accessible streams
• Developers are not responsible for the content downloaded

AGE & CONTENT RESPONSIBILITY:
If you download adult or age-restricted content, full responsibility is yours. Ensure your actions comply with local and regional laws. The developers bear no responsibility for your content choices.

LEGAL COMPLIANCE:
• Use this app only with content you have permission to download
• Respect copyright, intellectual property, and local regulations
• Do not use this app to download copyrighted content without permission

DISCLAIMER:
• This is not a commercial product
• No warranty or support is provided
• Use at your own risk
• By downloading, you accept all responsibility for your actions

If you do not agree, exit the app now.
